msg: (test_traps): Used rw_any_t in informational output and used
the "%b" specifier to format Boolean values.

author: tobrien
msg: Addresses issue 37894.  Order of static initialization causes
an NPE when trying to use static US_ENGLISH in Soundex.
Issue was found by Reggie Riser.

author: sebor
msg: * printf.cpp (_rw_vasnprintf_c99): Added a case for the 'b' format
specifier as an extension for the formatting of Boolean values.
(_rw_fmtinteger): Added handling of the 'b' format specifier.
